units.name: TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank

units: TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank
TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank

upgrades.name: Stormtrooper Captain
upgrades.description: When you activate, you cannot remove suppression tokens or be suppressed during this activation.

upgrades.name: Phase I Clone Captain
upgrades.description: When you activate, you cannot remove suppression tokens or be suppressed during this activation.

upgrades.name: Veteran Clone Pilot
upgrades.description: While you or a friendly clone trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight attacks or defends, you and that units can spend each other's aim,dodge and surge tokens. During the End Phase, ready this card.

upgrades.name: Aggressive Tactics
upgrades.description: While you are the nominated commander, after issuing orders , choose up to 4 friendly units with faceup order tokens. Each chosen unit gains 1 surge token.

upgrades.name: Commanding Presence
upgrades.description: When issuing orders, you can issue orders at range 4.

upgrades.name: Esteemed Leader
upgrades.description: While you are defending, each friendly corps trooper unit at range 1 gains Guardian 1.

upgrades.name: Improvised Orders
upgrades.description: After an order token is drawn from a friendly order pool, draw a second order token from that pool. Choose 1 to use and shuffle the other back into the order pool. If you do, during the End Phase, ready this card.

upgrades.name: Inspiring Presence
upgrades.description: Friendly units at range 1-4 can use your courage value when checking whether they are panicked. This range can be reduced by other effects.

upgrades.name: Strict Orders
upgrades.description: When a friendly trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, during its Rally step, it may remove 1 suppression token instead of rolling dice.

upgrades.name: Vigilance
upgrades.description: During the End Phase, choose either 1 friendly trooper unit at range 1-2 or up to 2 friendly {CORPS} trooper units at range 1-2. Each chosen unit does not remove 1 dodge token.

upgrades.name: Comms Jammer
upgrades.description: Enemy units at range 1 cannot be issued orders, unless they are issuing an order to themselves.

upgrades.name: Comms Relay
upgrades.description: When you would be issued an order, you may choose a friendly unit at range 1-2. Issue an order to the chosen unit instead. If you do, you cannot be issued another order during this round.

upgrades.name: HQ Uplink
upgrades.description: During the Issue Orders step of the Command Phase, issue an order to yourself.

upgrades.name: Integrated Comms Antenna
upgrades.description: During the Command Phase, you can be issued orders by friendly Commander or Operative inits at range 1-4.

upgrades.name: Long Range Comlink
upgrades.description: During the Command Phase, you may be issued orders as though you are in range of the nominated commander.

upgrades.name: Anger
upgrades.description: After you suffer 1 or more wounds, gain 1 aim token.

upgrades.name: Battle Meditation
upgrades.description: When you issue orders, one of those orders can be issued to any friendly unit on the battlefield.

upgrades.name: Force Barrier
upgrades.description: While another friendly trooper unit at range 1 is defending against a ranged attack, during the Modify Attack Dice step, cancel either 1 Dice Crit result or up to 2 Dice Hit results.

upgrades.name: Emergency Stims
upgrades.description: During an attack, when you would suffer wounds, prevent up to 2 wounds and place an equal number of wound tokens on this card instead. If you do, at the end of your next activation, discard each token on this card and suffer wounds equal to the number of tokens discarded.

upgrades.name: Barrage Generator
upgrades.description: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has Fixed, add 2 white attack dice and apply Suppressive to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: Overcharged Generator
upgrades.description: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has Fixed, add 1 black attack dice and apply Impact 1 to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: EMP "Droid Poppers"
upgrades.description: While one or more of this weapon is in your attack pool, your attack pool gains Ion 1.

upgrades.name: Defensive Stance
upgrades.description: When you perform an dodge action, gain 2 dodge tokens instead of 1. You cannot spend aim tokens.

upgrades.name: Duck and Cover
upgrades.description: While defending against a ranged attack, during the Apply Dodge and Cover step, you may gain 1 suppression token.

upgrades.name: Endurance
upgrades.description: At the end of the Activation phase, you may remove 1 suppression token.

upgrades.name: Hunter
upgrades.description: While attacking a wounded trooper unit, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may gain 1 aim token.

upgrades.name: Offensive Stance
upgrades.description: When you perform an aim action, gain 2 aim tokens instead of 1. You cannot spend dodge tokens.

upgrades.name: Seize the Initiative
upgrades.description: During the Issue Orders Step or the Command Phase, issue an order to yourself.

upgrades.name: Tenacity
upgrades.description: While performing a melee attack, if you are wounded or if one or more of your minis have been defeated, add 1 red attack die to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: Rebel Trooper Captain
upgrades.description: When you activate, you cannot remove suppression tokens or be suppressed during this activation.

upgrades.name: Ryder Azadi
upgrades.description: While performing a move, increase or decrease your maximum speed by 1.

upgrades.name: OOM-series Battle Droid
upgrades.description: When you use Coordinate, you can issue an order at range 1-2 instead of range 1.

upgrades.name: Aggressive Tactics
upgrades.description: During the Command Phase, if you were nominated, after issuing orders choose up to 4 friendly units with faceup order tokens. Each chosen unit gains 1 surge token.

upgrades.name: Commanding Presence
upgrades.description: When issuing orders, you can issue orders at range 14.

upgrades.name: Comms Relay
upgrades.description: When you would be issued an order, you may choose a friendly unit at range 1-2. Issue an order to the chosen unit instead. If you do, you cannot be issued another order during this round.

upgrades.name: Long Range Comlink
upgrades.description: During the Command Phase, you can be issued orders by friendly {RANK:COMMANDER} or {RANK:OPERATIVE} units regardless of range..

upgrades.name: Battle Meditation
upgrades.description: While you are issuing orders using a command card, you may issue 1 of those orders to any friendly unit on the battlefield, instead of a unit indicated on the command card.
